name: TRAP UNIT FIGHTERS(TUF MOBILE)(public beta)
description:
my game for collective(music on soundcloud)(sprites were made by CynderQuil)(3 charaters avaliabe) Tamika(dragon)Aryana(kobold maid)Taariq(eevee)This is my first SERIOUS game so,its not gonna be that good but,im learning,when full full game come out then price im asking for is 5 dollars

CONTROLS FOR PC

W=jump

ASD=MOVE

F=SHOOT 

G=HIT

ARROW KEYS=MOVE

J=SHOOT

K=HIT

GAME CONTROLLER PLAYS PLAYER 3

DPADS=MOVE

A=HIT

B=SHOOT

WORKS WITH ANDROID AS WELL
